dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependent_to.description: Load configuration from different file formats, transparently
dependent_to.name: perl-config-any

dependent_to.description: Watch for changes to files, cross-platform style
dependent_to.name: perl-file-changenotify

dependent_to.description: Critique Perl source code for best-practices.
dependent_to.name: perl-perl-critic

description: Automatically give your module the ability to have plugins
name: perl-module-pluggable

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
